p: The highest antioxidant activity by DPPH assay was recorded in pomegranate peels crude juice followed by guava leaves, pomegranate leaves, olive leaves crude juices while it was the lowest in fig leaves crude juice. Comparable results were gained from the reducing power assay, pomegranate peels crude juice exhibited a better reducing power activity. Instead, a lower activity was observed for guava leaves crude juice. Pomegranate peels crude juice exhibited strong potential to act as a metal chelator while pomegranate leaves showed lower capacity for metal ion chelation.
